name: Cards of Lust
description:
Cards of Lust is a strip tease card combat game.

Like any card game, luck plays a big role in each turn's outcome, but thanks to its innovative strategy selector, Cards of Lust lets you influence which cards are dealt to you, so you have the chance to react accordingly. For example, you can hint the dealer for healing cards if you're running low on health, and there's a better chance you'll get one.

Features:
  • Straightforward and addicting gameplay
  • 3 gorgeous girls to play against
  • 5 progression levels per girl
  • FullHD animations at 60fps
  • Deck of 40 cards
  • Strategy selector lets you influence your luck with the dealer
  • Small install size and low system requirements
